articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner is cleared of any wrongdoing after twice testing positive for a banned substance in March.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner cleared of any wrongdoing after twice testing positive for banned substance in March

articles.description: England have made no secret of their long-term Ashes planning, and now they can prepare for the unthinkable - life without Ben Stokes.
articles.title: 'England and Ollie Pope can prepare for life without Ben Stokes'

articles.description: The 2024 Women's T20 World Cup will now take place in the United Arab Emirates after civil unrest results in the ICC moving the tournament from Bangladesh.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Tournament moved from Bangladesh to UAE

articles.description: Ollie Pope says England are still Ben Stokes’ team despite the batter taking charge for the three-Test series against Sri Lanka.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Ollie Pope says hosts still Ben Stokes' team despite injury

articles.description: At the end of the Cold War, East Germany's systematic doping secrets spilled out. The truth on the other side of the Berlin Wall has taken longer to emerge.
articles.title: East v West Germany: The drug-fuelled Cold War for medals

articles.description: Brentford forward Ivan Toney should not move to Saudi Arabia while he is at his "peak", says ex-Premier League striker Chris Sutton.
articles.title: Ivan Toney: Chris Sutton warns 'peak' England forward against Saudi Arabia move

articles.description: Britain’s Charley Hull is a rare European hope for this week's AIG Women's Open at St Andrews after a nightmare start at the Olympics cost her a medal chance.
articles.title: Women’s Open: Charley Hull a rare European hope at St Andrews after Olympics frustration

articles.description: Wolves submit an offer to sign Arsenal and England goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale on a season-long loan deal.
articles.title: Aaron Ramsdale: Wolves bid to sign Arsenal goalkeeper on loan

articles.description: Samoan cricketer Darius Visser sets a new men's Twenty20 International record when he hit 39 runs in a single over during a 2026 T20 World Cup regional qualifier on Tuesday.
articles.title: Darius Visser: Samoan cricketer sets new Twenty20 International record with 39 runs in a single over

articles.description: Three-time champion Primoz Roglic wins the first mountain stage of this year's Vuelta a Espana to claim the race leader's red jersey.
articles.title: Vuelta a Espana: Primoz Roglic wins stage four to take red jersey
